definition: can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy

sentences.english: Hydraulic pump driven by mechanical energy.
When people open or close a door, the door produces mechanical energy that could be turned into electric energy.
sentences.chinese: 人們開關門時，門所產生的機械能可轉化成爲電能。

sentences.english: A generator transforms mechanical energy into electricity.
sentences.chinese: 發電機把機械能轉變成電。

sentences.english: Motor protein is a kind of small machines that convert chemical energy to mechanical works.
sentences.chinese: 分子馬達是一類將化學能轉化爲機械能的微小機器。

sentences.english: A dynamo transforms mechanical energy into electricity.
sentences.chinese: 發電機使機械能轉換爲電。

sentences.english: All heat engines use the expansion of gases to convert heat energy into mechanical energy.
sentences.chinese: 所有熱機都利用氣體膨脹來把熱能轉換爲機械能。

sentences.english: This wind-driven generator can turn wind energy into mechanical energy.
sentences.chinese: 風力機是把風能轉化成機械能的裝置。

sentences.english: Let's try the conservation of mechanical energy.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們試着用機械能，守恆定律解答一下。
